eu.mondo.mondix.live

Interface IChangeAwareMondixInstance

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IMondixInstance
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChangeAwareMondixInstance

    public interface IChangeAwareMondixInstance
extends IMondixInstance
    Base relations published by a change-aware Mondix indexer instance may be IChangeAwareMondixRelations. The indexer additionally publishes information whether it is currently in a consistent state.
    Author:
    Bergmann Gabor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addConsistencyListener(IConsistencyCallback consistencyListener)
      The given listener will be notified of consistency points from now on.
      boolean isConsistent()
      Returns true iff the entire mondix instance is in a consistent state.
      void removeConsistencyListener(IConsistencyCallback consistencyListener)
      The given listener will no longer be notified of consistency points from now on.

      • Methods inherited from interface eu.mondo.mondix.core.IMondixInstance

        getBaseRelationByName, getCatalogRelation, getPublishedRelationNames

    • Method Detail

      • isConsistent

        boolean isConsistent()
        Returns true iff the entire mondix instance is in a consistent state.

        Guarantees if true is returned:

        • All queries of the mondix instance return mutually consistent results.
        • Changing the model must be tolerated at this point.

        See IConsistencyCallback for more guarantees.

      • addConsistencyListener

        void addConsistencyListener(IConsistencyCallback consistencyListener)
        The given listener will be notified of consistency points from now on.

        See IConsistencyCallback for guarantees.

      • removeConsistencyListener

        void removeConsistencyListener(IConsistencyCallback consistencyListener)
        The given listener will no longer be notified of consistency points from now on.
